Pantheios - Project Map - scripts

This directory contains the Ruby code-generation script make_hdrs.rb used to (re-)generate the Pantheios Application Layer function template suites log() log_DEBUG() log_INFORMATIONAL() log_NOTICE() log_WARNING() log_ERROR() log_CRITICAL() log_ALERT() and log_EMERGENCY()

To (re-)generate, open a shell / command-box in this directory and execute the script.
